channel.title: My npc's wont force chat?!

item.title: My npc's wont force chat?!
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“Projectkingdom, post:1, topic:475361”]Hey i added the code for force chat but the npc wont chat. :L

heres my code

if (npcs[i].npcType == 209) { //npc id if (Misc.random2(2) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Nex has been added!"); } }[/quote]

Try this if (npcs.npcType == 209) {//npc id
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “Nex has been added.”;
}
}

Read full topic

@Team_Rocket wrote:

This isn’t the solution to your problem, but you don’t need to Update all of your N.P.C. for a single N.P.C.

item.title: My npc's wont force chat?!
item.dc:creator: @Projectkingdom Projectkingdom
item.description:
@Projectkingdom wrote:

[quote=“allstarrevolutionz, post:2, topic:475361”]First of all, POST THE TYPE OF CODE YOU’RE USING
Secondly it should look something like this

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID) {
if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “NPC TEXT.”;
}
}[/quote]

(facepalm) Look at my thread better the code is posted
